lender.name: René Fischer
lender.loan_because: I'am human.
lender.occupational_info: Kreativarbeiter, Purist, social geek, food aficionado, liebevoller Vater, glücklich verheiratet und Business Development Manager bei Exact in München.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: Interest-free loans offer a hand-up instead of a handout to those in need, promoting self-sufficiency with dignity. I prefer anonymous lending but have chosen to show my name on Kiva to help encourage others to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of an interest-free loan association in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA. I help people with personal loans - very similarly to Kiva - except confidentially and within my own community.

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a tremendous difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I like to travel and make excellent fried rice.

lender.name: Eveline
lender.loan_because: I have a nice life and I think that other people deserve a chance at a nice life too.

lender.name: Renate
lender.loan_because: I like to see people grow

lender.name: Ezonez LLC
lender.loan_because: We Care.
lender.occupational_info: Business Development

lender.name: Alan B
lender.loan_because: it would be irresponsible not to.

lender.name: kim
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute to another persons dreams and hopes, and help make things better. Loaning through Kiva is a very practical way of dreaming of a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organizations to achieve their goals and ambitions, both on a large and very small scale. I help them to structure their business in an efficient way and focus on their goals, and give them lots of creative ideas to work towards them.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: The Spirit within me honours the Spirit in you. It is my joy to assist you. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to be married to a wonderful lady. I have 3 beautiful children who are all married to wonderful people. God has greatly blessed me. My job is to make sure all of the flight documentation is alright before an airplane flys, that the weather is alright to fly and that the crews are legal and safe. I love aviation and am blessed to work in a field that I enjoy.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than to receive. In the past I was blessed to receive and now I want to give back.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a little change in the world...one little step at a time

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Well 4 reasons really. Firstly because it is a way of helping someone who needs a little help, secondly because it is not creating dependence and the same money can be rolled around and help lots of people. Thirdly because I am an atheist and know that God won't help them.... and the atheists are the biggest lending group..... that really pleases me. And finally and selfishly, it makes me feel really great to change someones life for the better without changing my own more than imperceptibly.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large multinational electrical company, travel most of the time to all corners of the world to help in businesses that are in difficulties or want to improve their performance.

lender.name: Zachary Spencer
lender.loan_because: Funding businesses and education are the ideal way to add social value to the world.

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: live your dreams

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I'm able and I like to help in anyway that I can. I hope you do too!
lender.occupational_info: I build websites and help increase web presence through marketing, PR and social media.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I'm not really wealthy but I;m blessed and lucky to be living the life I am. Spread a little love :o)

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It enables me to make a positive impact and helps somebody in reaching their personal aims and become self-sufficient - even by loaning small amounts.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: In my work I show teachers how to use the internet and other technologies, in their teaching.

lender.name: Ola
lender.loan_because: I'd wish someone would lend me money if I vere to find myself in a tight spot.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, you feed him for a lifetime." I loan because I want to give people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a teacher in the beautiful state of Jalisco, Mexico.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I believe we are here on this earth to help other people and I love helping others.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: It is a beautiful thing!

lender.name: Heath
lender.loan_because: I think there are alot of good people out there in tough times. When we think we have it bad there are others whom really have it worse and I think that having more than I need puts me in a position to help someone get to a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate car crashes in which someone either dies or is seriously injured. I also investigate alcohol/drug impaired driving crimes.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I live in America. I have a flush toilet, a hot shower, and freedom; what else do I need? Oh, yeah: a bike!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's good to give something back. I wouldn't have this opportunity if I hadn't been helped.
lender.occupational_info: I design brand identities, logos, websites, brochures and other advertising materials.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a world where it isn't a situation of longatud or latitude that causes poverty. I want to live in a world where we can share resources. A world where love transends nationality, colour, class and creed
lender.occupational_info: I do general plumbing for a city firm

lender.loan_because: .. this is the better way to really help people.
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of the large customers of my employer in Bavaria and Austria.

lender.occupational_info: My work is very challenging. I have to chase the passanger so that I can compete the other taxi driver. I will make a small store for other kind of business. I need to survive myelf being an orphan. The money that i will receive from the loan I will first put in the bank while I start my store and cater the tourist in our province as well.

lender.loan_because: the buzz I get from loaning on Kiva lasts much longer than the buzz from winning an ebay auction :)
lender.occupational_info: my work helps people maintain their independence by protecting or restoring sight.

lender.name: Vannina
lender.loan_because: Until last year I was a student and had no money to loan, but now that I have a bit of a safety net and know how reassuring it can be, I'd like to give people a chance to achieve the same level of financial security, esp women in countries where their access to property is limited.

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I design the websites.

lender.occupational_info: I'm studying international development and human security and hope to work with refugees in the future.

lender.name: Rogers Family
lender.loan_because: It is more important to give opportunities than to give money. Good luck to all those enterprising folks out there!
lender.occupational_info: My husband owns his own business as a computer consultant for small to medium sized businesses. I am a domestic goddess with four children to transport, teach, care for and love.

lender.name: katherine
lender.loan_because: I believe what goes around comes around. I enjoy knowing I am part of a community joined energetically by a common goal.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare meals for seniors;

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It's human - no profiteers in between us!!!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference in the world! I hope people will not be shy about making a donation, for fear it is "too small." Just think how every donation adds up.
lender.occupational_info: I am very involved in making people aware of endangered species, particularly the threat of extinction to the orangutans. They are so gentle and intelligent. For holidays and any occasion that requires gift giving, I think it would be great to give certiicates that donations have been made in someone's honor.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I believe it it. I believe that being born when and where I was has made me incredibly privileged, and I want to reach out to others who do not have the advantages that I do.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make sure that the work done by our library staff is recorded statistically, and to report those statistics regionally and nationally. My job also includes looking at how students' experiences at our library can be improved, as well as working on diverse research projects with librarians.

lender.name: jessamyn
lender.loan_because: I've had a lot of lucky breaks in my life and I think I should pass them on.

lender.occupational_info: Repairing copy machines, computers, printers. I love his work. But for the successful implementation of needed money for the purchase of materials and components.

lender.occupational_info: I work at finding new drug targets for wide-spread diseases

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to help and empower others. It's an incredible feeling to be able to get one's feet off the ground and make their ideas a reality, so I feel honored when I can be a part of that.

lender.occupational_info: I am an Intelligence Analyst for the US Army. I am currently deployed in Iraq with 1st Infantry Division.

lender.name: Aaron

lender.name: Edmond

lender.name: Lloyd
lender.loan_because: It's good to help people become financially independent.

lender.name: Charline

The money that helps one person can be recycled for another and so on. The small amount I can provide can help out a great number of people.

lender.loan_because: I think it's the best way to tackle poverty

lender.name: Elles
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to optimize their bottom line and productivity by training their management in leadership. Also I do assessments on people they want to hire or people they want to give more responsibilities.

lender.name: Business-Startup.ie
lender.loan_because: Seeing businesses succeed, whether at home in Ireland or around the world, gives us a great buzz!
lender.occupational_info: Making it easier for Irish start-ups to succeed!

lender.name: Scarlet Fashion GmbH
lender.loan_because:
Aus eigener Erfahrung wissen wir, wie es ist, als Kleinunternehmer ein eigenes Geschäft aufzubauen. Es gehört viel Mut, Ehrgeiz und natürlich auch ein wenig Glück dazu. Die Geschäftsidee mag noch so gut sein - aber ohne Geld kann man heute einfach nichts realisieren.
Wir haben es uns zum Ziel gemacht, andere Kleinstunternehmen zu unterstützen und jeweils einen Teil unseres Gewinnes als Darlehen bei Kiva in Umlauf zu bringen.
Sobald die Darlehen zurückgezahlt werden, investieren wir diese wieder in neue Unternehmer und helfen so immer aufs Neue.
lender.occupational_info: Brautkleider-Online.ch ist eine Online-Boutique für Braut- und Abendmode sowie Brautaccessoires. Durch Direktimport aus China können wir Ihnen Top-Preise anbieten, bei denen auch die Qualität stimmt. Überzeugen Sie sich selbst!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small acts of faith and grace. All such gifts find their root in God.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature and rhetoric in a small Christian school

lender.name: William Reed
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, as people have helped me, to find a Creative Career Path, to support themselves and their families while doing what they love to do, using thier talents and resources, and making their world a better place through their work.
lender.occupational_info: I help Entrepreneurs at the Creative Edge, by providing information through my blog which can help Entrepreneurs to help themselves, using tools like Guerrilla Marketing, Flexible Focus, Physical Finesse, Social Media, Blogging, and Wealth Dynamics.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: to help someones dream will come true

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I need to support group that is presently having a research about CLIA.
lender.occupational_info: it is very good because you are able to help other people even in a simple way.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: “You can have everything in life that you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.” -Z.Z.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: Tengo 49 años, casado 3 hijos, dos de ellos estudiantes, junto al menor estamos desarrollando nuestra empresa de servicio y venta de productos para la industria, Nuestra necesidad es para poder mejorar nuestros equipos de informatica y mejorar la comunicacion con las empresas que represento , Para ello necesitaria $ uruguayos 30.000
lender.occupational_info: Hemos logrado la posibilidad de representar a empresas del exterior y ofrecer sus servicios y equipos en nuestro pais, Argentina y Brasil, Realizamos muchas de nuesras gestiones a traves de internet y viajando a los lugares de contacto con empresarios y fabricantes

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Man is designed to be an extraordinary success .... sometimes he needs help ....

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping people become self-reliant, living their purpose and finding their Divine Light. This is the path to true freedom. What better way to help those around the world than to get them started on the road to sustainable businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We all have a unique contribution to make, a purpose for being born on this planet. I work with others to help them remove barriers (like limiting beliefs and self-concepts) that keep them in the shadows instead of shining and showing their brilliance. My fondest desire is that we all find our place and our way of contributing to creating a Paradise On Earth NOW.

lender.name: AL-WAHHÂB
lender.loan_because:
Allah tells me in the Quran Surah 2:245 "Who is he that will loan to Allah a beautiful loan, which Allah will double unto his credit and multiply many times? It is Allah that giveth (you) Want or plenty, and to Him shall be your return."
To all we need Allah to bestow on us his mercy and to provide for us so we can provide for our family.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of sick children.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone prosper on this planet. Mother Earth loves us and we should love each other and the planet.
lender.occupational_info: I have a holistic health business and am a healer. I bring products to market that are herbal or nutritional. I see clients in my office 1 or 2 days a week and the rest of the time I work on developing the products and services I work with.

lender.name: Eligio
lender.occupation: Bussiness administration and c. p. a.

lender.name: Annika
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I feel we all have an obligation to reach out to fellow humans. I strongly believe in Pay-It-Forward and in the kindness of the human heart.
lender.occupational_info: I am a public servant and jewelry designer but my first and most important role is that of a parent. I want my children to grow up secure and loved and aware of the responsibilities we have as adults, our commitments in helping friends, family, strangers - contributing to the community in which we live.

lender.name: Sayeed
lender.loan_because: Help humanity through kiva is truly an amazing thing. Enriching and ultimately enhancing the quality of life for people all around the world is definitely something worth doing. Thanks kiva for this great principle, and for making this world a better place, one loan at a time;)
lender.occupational_info: currently pursuing academics at the university level and so far it's been really great ...crazy ride indeed !

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe micro lending is a phenomenal self empowerment tool for struggling entrepreneurs... a proverbial hand-up!
lender.occupational_info: I work to create employment and attract business to under served markets.

lender.name: Tod
lender.loan_because: We want to help people manage on their own.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I like to help deserving people.

lender.name: fraser
lender.loan_because: envision a world where all people - even in the most remote areas of the globe - hold the power to create opportunity for themselves and others.

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: We want to support other manufacturers around the world
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture exhibition and retail displays.

lender.name: Ronny
lender.loan_because: Cooperation is more important than profit. Connecting people around the world is a wonderful thing. Thank you KIVA for making it possible to reach out and help people.

lender.name: Damian
lender.loan_because: We want to work with other manufacturers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture display products for retailers and exhibitions.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am called to empower and support the women of the world who have not been given some of the opportunities that I have been blessed with. I believe that women moving into positions of influence will help generate peace and a more sustainable world.
lender.occupational_info: I help accountants find consulting opportunities. I also teach hatha yoga.

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: It's good
lender.occupational_info: I'm content

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to meet and help people from all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I develop machine learning algorithms and distributed computer systems for a small finance company in Montreal.

lender.name: Zsombor
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Andi
lender.loan_because: I'm studying economics and I love the idea about microfinancing
lender.occupational_info: I'm still at the university trying to understand how markets work

lender.name: Christoffer
lender.loan_because: ... it is a great idea to bring the people of this world closer together!
lender.occupational_info: Doctor for business units

lender.name: college@cfc
lender.loan_because: God's heart is for the poor and oppressed. As followers of Jesus, God's son, we seek to share that same heart. We desire to loose the bonds of injustice and set the oppressed free.
lender.occupational_info: We are a college-age community of Jesus followers gathering together to take ownership of our journey of faith, discern next steps in that journey, and take part in movements that speak about the grace and peace found in Jesus Christ

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I am a entrepreneur myself and have my own small business. I support small businesses around my home and like to see hardworking people receive blessings!
lender.occupational_info: I make leather book covers, book marks and key fobs. All my work is done 100% by myself and by hand. No machines or presses. I take great pride in my creations and have 3 years experience. I get many reorders and do custom designs. I create several different types of covers and love what I do.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: I had a good life so far and I simply want to give something back to "the world"

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I have received great benefits from people having faith and belief in me. I hope I can pass a little of this on to others.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I worked in microfinance and know it works.
lender.occupational_info: NGO financial manager

lender.name: Manav
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see entrepreneurs realize their ideas and potential.
